'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A makeshift infirmary of sorts, treating the sick and feeble Roparu of the Gullet.

Recently, a spike in cases of drowner's lung has forced Pitli to hide the sickly to keep the illness (and the gossip) from spreading, lest the higher-ups find out and send them straight to the Old City.

==Points of interest==
* Approaching the back room will trigger a cutscene where Pitli begs you not to tell anyone about the ill Roparu she is hiding.
* Two containers in the area contain minor loot, including a [[Potion of Deftness]] and a [[Potion of Merciless Gaze (Deadfire)|Potion of Merciless Gaze]]

==Characters==
* [[Pitli]], healer and follower of the [[Children of the Dawnstars]].
